com.opencredo.concursus.data.tuples

Class Tuple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opencredo.concursus.data.tuples.Tuple

  • public final class Tuple
extends Object
    An immutable tuple of named and typed values, conforming to a TupleSchema.

      • get

        public Object get(String name)
        Get the value contained in the slot with the supplied name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the slot to get the value from.
        Returns:
        The value stored in that slot.

      • get

        public <T> T get(TupleKey<T> key)
        Get the value contained in the slot referenced by the supplied key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value stored in the slot.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to use to find the slot.
        Returns:
        The value stored in the slot.

      • serialise

        public <V> Map<String,V> serialise(java.util.function.Function<Object,V> serialiser)
        Serialise the tuple using the supplied serialiser.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The type to serialise each value to, e.g. String.
        Parameters:
        serialiser - The serialiser to use to serialise each value in the tuple.
        Returns:
        A map of serialised values.
